import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./design.css"; import Chart from "../../components/chart/Chart" import {productData} from "../../dummyData" import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useEffect, useMemo, useState } from "react"; import { userRequest } from "../../RequestMethods"; export default function Design() { const location = useLocation() const designId = location.pathname.split('/')[2]; const [designStats, setDesignStats] = useState([]) const design = useSelector((state) => state.design.designs.find(design => design._id === designId) ) const MONTHS = useMemo( () => [ 'Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec', ], []) useEffect(() => { const getStats = async () => { try { const res = await userRequest.get('orders/income?pid=' + designId) const list = res.data.sort((a,b) => { return a._id - b._id }) list.map((item)=> setDesignStats((prev)=>[ ...prev, {name:MONTHS[item._id - 1], Sales: item.total}, ]) ) } catch (error) {} } getStats() },[MONTHS]) return (

setFile(e.target.files[0])}/>
